data/ph-top/2021/10/micro-saas.json: All you need to build your own SaaS at one place. Covers everything right from starting it from scratch to selling it. Resources and inspirations included.
data/ph-top/2021/10/crewdle.json: The first carbon-neutral video communication platform worldwide Crewdle offers a serverless digital ecosystem that is secure and sustainable, thanks to peer-to-peer technology. The perfect solution to help save the planet, one conversation at a time.

data/ph-top/2021/10/templateshake.json: An inspirational tool for design team and product owners. Create and share your personal collection of your favourite design cases with a team and client. Showcase your vision. Make a market research. Explore global markets.
data/ph-top/2021/10/vpaint.json: VPaint is an open source vector graphics editor where the shapes you draw can have shared boundaries and be intuitively sculpted. It's a prototype you can download now, but we're running a Kickstarter to turn it into a more complete product: VGC Illustration.
